celebrationSection1.title: Four Decades of Design
celebrationSection1.description: With 40 years of experience, we create living spaces that balance luxury with lasting quality. Our work is built to stand the test of time. This is design that doesn’t just fill a room, but defines it; serving as the quiet foundation for the life you build within. Every line, material, and proportion is considered with intention; crafted not for trends, but for longevity. We believe true luxury reveals itself slowly, through comfort, function, and an enduring sense of belonging.

celebrationSection2.title: Art of living
celebrationSection2.description: Through our bespoke mastery, every corner becomes a silent chapter of your unique story. Through our bespoke mastery, every corner becomes a silent chapter of your unique story. Shaped by intention, balance, and craft, each space is designed to reflect who you are.

cherfanPlus.title: Light and Space
cherfanPlus.description: Beyond the blueprint lies a home with a soul. Journey through our curated world—from the heart of the kitchen to the finest living details; designed to elevate every moment.

kidsBedroomSection.label: KIDS BEDROOM
kidsBedroomSection.title: Design built for discovery
kidsBedroomSection.description: A bedroom is a child's entire universe. We craft furniture that inspires curiosity while maintaining a sense of calm. Our goal is to create a peaceful sanctuary where your little ones have the room they need to play, learn, and rest.
kidsBedroomSection.description1: Using the same architectural standards as our signature collections, these pieces are made to endure. We combine natural, safe materials with timeless shapes. This is furniture designed to grow with your child, from their first steps to their biggest dreams.

cards.label: The Craft
cards.description: Our team brings decades of technical knowledge to every piece we build. Skilled hands ensure that every detail meets our standards for durability and finish.

cards.label: The Logistics
cards.description: Our dedicated warehouse and fleet manage final stages of the journey. We maintain full control over storage and delivery to ensure project arrives safely.
